rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment quotes a statement of confidence (Q5), not an Alarmist cue (Q2).
The segment quotes a statement about elimination, not impact with scale.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment expresses confidence in future elimination ('we will be able to eliminate this'), not current safety/control.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment states they will be able to eliminate the outbreak, not a bare negation.
Describes a hopeful future possibility ('we will be able to eliminate this') contingent on safeguards ('good biosecurity, with good farmer participation') without explicit reassurance.
